channel.title: How can i make monster have higher HP, And Hit Higher than 0'?
channel.description:
how can i make monsters hit higher on people, and have higher hp along with them not atting like a weird glitch thing, so they do a emote or gfx when they hit u?
what file would i need to edit and were EX: 100-goblin
lets say i want to make him hit up to 50 and have 200hp with a cool gfx/emote attack style?
how can i do this, thanks :]?
